title: Fix logo not displaying by placing uploaded logo asset at the referenced path

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded logo image file to the frontend static assets so it is served at the exact path `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` (i.e., place/overwrite the file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`) without modifying the image content (keep the white background; do not make it transparent).
acceptanceCriteria: The file `frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` exists in the repo and matches the uploaded image content (no edits such as transparency/background removal).
Loading the app shows the logo image rendered in the header logo square (SiteHeader) with no broken image icon.
Loading the app shows the logo image rendered in the footer logo square (SiteFooter) with no broken image icon.
The `` `src` remains `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` in both header and footer (no change to a different path).

constraints: Do not change the referenced logo path `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`.
Do not alter the uploaded logo image (no cropping, recoloring, or transparency/background changes).
nonGoals: Redesigning the site layout, colors, or typography beyond what is necessary to fix the missing logo.
Changing the logo sizing/fit behavior (object-fit) unless required to address the missing-image issue.
